title.title: Projects
title.content:
Curious about the projects I've built over the years?
From dynamic websites to advanced apps and a custom AI object detection model,
I've worked on a variety of exciting projects.
On this page, you'll find detailed explanations and even a guided tour of some of my open-source code.

items.title: My programming experience
items.content:
Over the past three years, I have been actively engaged in a wide range of programming projects, both as part of my academic coursework and through self-directed study. My experience spans various domains, from school-assigned website development tasks to personal projects that reflect my passion for technology and innovation. These independent initiatives include app development, as well as more advanced fields like artificial intelligence and machine learning, where I have been working on building my own object detection models.

My GitHub profile, "Daniel-Gman," showcases the majority of my school-related projects, and I am in the process of adding more personal, hobby-driven projects to further demonstrate my skills and interests. I am always eager to explore new technologies and refine my abilities through hands-on experience, and I look forward to continuing to expand my portfolio with both academic and personal projects.

items.title: AI/Machine learning
items.content:
Python/Pytorch/OpenCV
Yolov4/Machine learning
Neural networks/CNN/Jupyter Notebook/Tensorflow/Linear algabra

items.title: QR-Image generator
items.text:
In this project i managed to build an image to QR-code converter. the goal of this project was to 
take a picture through a camera and have a QR bring u to a page with ur phone that allows u to download the image.
I highly recommend to read the explenation on my github to see the full explenation

items.title: Parental control app
items.text:
In this project i created a parental controll app for Android using Android Studio and Java, The goal for the app was to have a lock system for the child
 like Family link. The parent can lock the childs phone with my app
items.link: There is no link to this project. its closed source

items.title: Real time AI object detection model
items.text:
In this project i made my own model to detect Male/Female people on security cameras. the goal of this was to see if i understood how to work
 with certain frameworks and knew how to work in the lable progress for AI object detection

items.title: Convolutional-neural-network
items.text:
